entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.content:
Oct 6, 11:40 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 6, 11:22 UTC
Update - We identified an issue with the checkout action download which was causing elevated actions failures. We have performed some mitigations and are continuing investigation.

Oct 6, 10:48 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.content:
Oct 5, 17:41 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 5, 17:24 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Oct 5, 17:03 UTC
Update - We are seeing recovery in Actions and will update status when all runs are no longer delayed.

Oct 5, 16:32 UTC
Update - Webhooks is operating normally.

Oct 5, 16:12 UTC
Update - We continue to see recovery and have added capacity to speed recovery time. We still expect to see slower than normal Actions job runs and webhook deliveries.

Oct 5, 15:04 UTC
Update - Actions is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Oct 5, 15:02 UTC
Update - We are continuing to monitor webhook deliveries following our earlier mitigation. Next update in 20 minutes.

Oct 5, 14:46 UTC
Update - We found an issue that impacts some of customers related to webhook delivery. We have implemented a mitigation and are monitoring for impact. Next update in 15 minutes.

Oct 5, 14:08 UTC
Update - Codespaces is operating normally.

Oct 5, 13:59 UTC
Update - We identified reports of Codespaces not creating/resuming successfully in eu-west region at 1230 UTC. We mitigated this issue and have seen recovery since 1315 UTC. Next update in 15 mins.

Oct 5, 13:32 UTC
Update - Webhooks is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Oct 5, 13:19 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Codespaces.

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.content:
Oct 5, 07:01 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 5, 06:30 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded availability for Actions.

entry.title: GitHub Enterprise Importer Maintenance
entry.content:
Oct 5, 05:00 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 5, 04:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Sep 29, 14:04 UTC
Scheduled - GitHub Enterprise Importer will be undergoing scheduled maintenance. During this time, all migrations will be paused. You will be able to queue new migrations, but they will not start until the end of the maintenance window.

entry.title: Incident with Codespaces
entry.content:
Oct 4, 21:34 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 4, 21:28 UTC
Update - We are seeing recovery in Codespace creation, but are continue to investigate the underlying cause to ensure stability

Oct 4, 21:21 UTC
Update - This issue does not impact starting existing Codespaces. If you experience issues starting a new Codespace, you can try using a region other than us-east

Oct 4, 20:56 UTC
Update - We are investigating reports of issues with Codespaces in the us-east region(s). Users in that location may not be able to connect to their Codespaces during this time. We are investigating contributing factors and will update you on progress towards mitigation.

Oct 4, 20:34 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Codespaces.

entry.title: Incident with Codespaces
entry.content:
Oct 4, 15:54 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 4, 15:04 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Codespaces.

entry.title: Incident with Codespaces
entry.content:
Sep 28, 19:56 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 28, 19:29 UTC
Update - We are investigating issues with Codespaces in eu-west region. The origin issue is resolved, however customers may experience delays in creation and resumption as we process the backlog of requests.

Sep 28, 18:52 UTC
Update - Codespaces is now experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

Sep 28, 18:35 UTC
Update - We are investigating issues with Codespaces in all regions due to VMs not coming online. We have applied a mitigation that resolved the underlying issue, and we are processing the backlog of requests.

Sep 28, 17:56 UTC
Update - We are investigating reports of issues with Codespaces in eu-west and se-asia regions. Users may not be able to connect to Codespaces during this time. We will update on progress towards mitigation.

Sep 28, 17:22 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded availability for Codespaces.

entry.title: Incident with Codespaces
entry.content:
Sep 28, 05:09 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 28, 04:42 UTC
Update - We have identified an issue that impacts port forwarding in the Codespaces web client. We are working on mitigation. As a workaround, you can use VS Code Desktop.

Sep 28, 03:53 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Codespaces.

entry.content:

entry.title: Incident with Codespaces
entry.content:
Aug 29, 18:31 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 29, 18:24 UTC
Update - We identified an issue that impacts most Codespaces customers. We have fully deployed a mitigation and are observing improved success rates for Codespaces creation and resumption operations.

Aug 29, 18:21 UTC
Update - Codespaces is now experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Aug 29, 17:48 UTC
Update - We identified an issue that impacts most Codespaces customers. We have authored a mitigation that will be deployed within 30 minutes. We will continue to keep you updated on progress.

Aug 29, 17:16 UTC
Update - We identified an issue that impacts most Codespaces customers. We are authoring a mitigation that will be deployed within one hour. We will continue to keep you updated on progress.

Aug 29, 16:34 UTC
Update - We identified an issue that impacts most Codespaces customers. We are authoring a mitigation that will be deployed within 90 minutes. We will continue to keep you updated on progress.

Aug 29, 16:02 UTC
Update - We identified an issue that impacts most Codespaces customers. We are authoring a mitigation that will be deployed within two hours. We will continue to keep you updated on progress.

Aug 29, 15:21 UTC
Update - We continuing to identify an issue that impacts most Codespaces customers and are working on mitigation. We will continue to keep you updated on progress.

Aug 29, 14:19 UTC
Update - Codespaces is now experiencing degraded availability. We are continuing to investigate.

Aug 29, 13:37 UTC
Update - We identified an issue that impacts many Codespaces customers and are working on mitigation. We will continue to keep you updated on progress.

Aug 29, 12:51 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Codespaces.
